colnames_to_column <- function(
        data,
        title
    ){

    col_names <- colnames(data)
    col_names_row <- as.data.frame(t(col_names))
    colnames(col_names_row) <- colnames(data)

    data_with_col <- data %>%
        mutate_all(
            as.character
        )

    data_with_col <- bind_rows(col_names_row, data_with_col)

    if(!missing(title)){
        tmp_data <- data.frame(
            matrix(
                ncol = ncol(data_with_col),
                nrow = 1
            )
        )
        colnames(tmp_data) <- colnames(data_with_col)
        title_row <- tmp_data %>%
            mutate(
                !!sym(colnames(data_with_col)[1]) := title
            )
        data_with_col <- bind_rows(
            title_row,
            data_with_col
        )
    }

    return(data_with_col)
}
